SecondHouse.Note.Text: The Commons disagree to Lords Amendment No 105 for the following reason—
Because it is inappropriate for the fitting of pollution abatement equipment to cause the
emissions limit duty to apply to existing generating stations.

MotionToMove.MotionText: Baroness Verma to move, That this House do not insist on its Amendment 105, to which the Commons have disagreed for their Reason 105A.
Lord Teverson to move, as an amendment to Motion A, leave out from “House” to end and insert “do insist on its Amendment 105”
Lord Oxburgh to move, as an amendment to Motion A, at end insert “, and do propose Amendment 105B in lieu”
